original_text: And as Samuel turned about to go away, he laid hold upon the skirt of his mantle, and it rent.
korean_text: 사무엘이 가려고 돌아설 때에 사울이 그의 겉옷자락을 붙잡으매 찢어진지라

sentences.original_text: And as Samuel turned about to go away
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사무엘이 돌아서 떠나려고 할 때

sentences.original_text: he laid hold upon the skirt of his mantle
